mapper.select: SELECT idx, title, hit, creator, DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_datetime FROM freeboard WHERE deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY idx DESC
SELECT idx, title, contents, writepwd, hit, creator, DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_datetime FROM freeboard WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE freeboard SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard ( title, contents, creator, created_datetime, writepwd ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{creator}, NOW(), #{writepwd} )
mapper.update: UPDATE freeboard SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents} WHERE idx = #{idx}
